about_the_game:
HUMOR AND EASTER EGGS
Mad Jack is a giant joke in the best possible way! Expect hilarious enemies, wacky bosses, and weapons so strange you'll be laughing and gasping at every turn. The game is packed with pop culture references and Easter eggs. Every run brings something new, and hidden surprises are waiting to be discovered each time you play!

A ROGUELIKE WITH A TWIST
Sure, you’ve probably played tons of roguelikes. But Mad Jack isn’t just another one. This game takes the roguelike genre and flips it on its head, with unpredictable mechanics, unique levels, and a constant stream of surprises. Every run feels like a brand-new adventure, packed with unexpected events and insane challenges. You'll never know what's coming next!

EPIC BOSSES AND CRAZY ENEMIES
They’re huge. They’re weird. And they’re out to get you! From massive, screen-filling bosses to bizarre enemies that require creative strategies, every fight in Mad Jack is a chaotic, hilarious struggle where the odds are stacked against you in the most fun way possible.

PROGRESSION AND CRAFTING
What’s better than getting stronger with every run? Collect materials, upgrade your weapons, and discover new ways to obliterate your enemies. The crafting system in Mad Jack lets you experiment, combine, and create ridiculous arsenals that make each subsequent run even more exciting.

REFERENCES EVERYWHERE
Are you a fan of Star Wars? Or maybe Game of Thrones is your thing? Mad Jack is full of clever references to iconic universes. Keep an eye out for hidden nods and Easter eggs that turn the game into a treasure hunt for pop culture lovers, giving you more to enjoy beyond just the gameplay.
